results.title: The Man of the beatitudes
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 8 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: in the olive grove Jesus sends his disciples off to their mission; John visits Mary the mother of Jesus; assault on Herod, the zealots manage to wound him; the Zealots arrested and killed in front of Herod’s palace; the Sermon on the Mount, the beatitudes, the Our Father; Peter tries to stop Jesus from going to Jerusalem; the crowds journey to Jerusalem for the festival; a messenger from Martha and Mary comes to Jesus; Jesus arrives at Bethany and learns that Lazarus has died; Martha and Mary convince Jesus to visit the tomb of Lazarus; Jesus raises Lazarus from the dead.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia

results.title: Friend of sinners
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 7 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus of Nazareth from: the shame of Mary Magdalene; the Rich Young Man approaches Jesus; the miracle of the loaves and the fishes; Zealots and Judas discuss the work of Jesus; Simon the Zealot follows Jesus; in the house of Simon the Pharisee; Joseph of Arimathea converses with Jesus; Mary Magdelene washes Jesus’ feet with her hair, Jesus forgives her sins.

results.brief_description:
Episode number 6 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Jesus in the house of Jairus; the raising of Jairus’ daughter; Salome asks for John the baptist’s head; John is murdered; Judas approaches Jesus to become his disciple.

results.title: The Forgiving Lord
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 5 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Jesus cures the paralytic man; Jesus is welcomed by Matthew and tells the parable of the prodigal son; Peter and Matthew are reconciled; Matthew and Peter leave everything and follow Jesus.

results.title: Liberator of the oppressed
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: John being arrested at Jordan; Jesus being chased out of the synagogue; Jesus goes to the synagogue and cures the possessed boy; Jesus calls John to follow him; the miraculous catch of fish; Matthew the tax collector; the parables of the Kingdom.

results.title: Sent by God
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: the return from Egypt of Mary, Joseph and the Child; Jesus’ bar mitzvah in the synagogue; Jesus is lost and found among the doctor’s in the temple; John preaches at Jordan; the Zealots discuss John’s mission; Jesus is baptized by John; Andrew and Philip follow Jesus.

results.brief_description:
Episode number 2 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
The continuing story of the life of Jesus Christ from: Joseph and Mary’s arrival in Bethlehem; the birth of Jesus; the census in Bethlehem; the gifts of the Magi; Herod’s rage and the killing of the Innocents and the flight to Egypt.

results.title: The Awaited Messiah
results.creator_credit: Franco Zeffirelli, Vincenzo Labella and Don Bosco Multimedia
results.brief_description:
Episode number 1 of Series “Jesus of Nazareth”.
This is the beginning of the story of the life of Jesus Christ, from the betrothal of Mary and Joseph; the Angel visits Mary; the wedding of Mary and Joseph and the unrest of young zealots.
